descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=red]※This MOD doesn't add 177 followers!※[/color][/size]

[size=4][color=yellow]This MOD adds some new followers in your Skyrim.[/color][/size]


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=6][color=yellow]15/10/21 v1.71 Updated.[/color][/size]
[size=5]Just slightly adjusted face. (Mira,Monica,Nora,Sandra)
Remade Serana. Added the options that you can select the presence or absence of the Fang.[/size]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[size=6][color=yellow]Followers:[/color][/size]
[size=5]Mira[/size]
[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/thumbnails/49935-2-1445072007.jpg?check=1445072257[/img]
Class:Swordman
Body:UNPB BBP [size=1]Selectable with two breast sizes small/huge.[/size]
Place:Whiterun Drunken Hunstman


[size=5]Monica[/size]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/thumbnails/49935-3-1445072007.jpg?check=1445072279[/img]
Class:Archer
Body:UNPB BBP
Place:Whiterun Drunken Huntsman


[size=5]Nora[/size]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/thumbnails/49935-4-1445072007.jpg?check=1445072237[/img]
Class:Mage(Destruction-Shock and Conjuration)
Body:UNPB BBP
Place:Whiterun Dragonsreach


[size=5]Sandra[/size]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/thumbnails/49935-0-1445072008.jpg?check=1445072267[/img]
Class:Barbarian
Body:UNPB BBP [size=1]Mega breast.[/size]
Place:Whiterun Dragonsreach


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[size=6][color=yellow]Optional:[/color][/size]
[size=5]Serana Beautification / Selja[/size]
[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/thumbnails/49935-0-1445404156.jpg?check=1445404185[/img]
[size=3]Selja is standalone. Not required Dawnguard.[/size]


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=6][color=yellow]Mods Used in Screenshots:[/color][/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21168/]Dragons Crown Sorceress Outfit for UNPB-BBP x[/url] by xp32
[url=http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/49935-2-1404803582.jpg]Mini Vamps UNP[/url] by HHaleyy
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38053/]Northgirl Armor[/url] by anka01
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33774/]Osare HotPants - UNP[/url] by anano
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34068/]Osare HotPants by anano Conversion UNPB and BBP also BBPx[/url] by MrTroubleMaker

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39573/?]Scrap Armor for UNP female Body[/url] by getcape


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[size=6][color=yellow]Change Log:[/color][/size]

Version 1.7
-Readjusted the molding of the face totality.
-Readjusted face and body textures.
-Improved the resolution of the cosmetic texture.
-Changed class name.

Version 1.6
-Adjusted face and body textures.

Version 1.51
-Adjusted modeling of face(around the lower jaw).

Version 1.5
-Re-adjusted under ECE v1.4 and ECEE v1.4.3.
-Adjusted the height and body style

Version 1.48
-Improved face in profile.

Version 1.47
-Re-created 4 characters (Mira, Monica, Nora, Sandra) in ECE v1.3.

Version 1.46
-Changed makeup and the molding of the face.

Version 1.45
-Adjusted a jaw line and the mouth.

Versin 1.44
-Adjusted modeling of face
.
Version 1.43
-Adjusted the height.

Version 1.42
-Differentiated muscle mass.

Version 1.41
-Fixed modeling of face.

Version 1.4
-Changed the size of the breast of each follower.

Version 1.371
-Fixed Installer moduleconfig.

Version 1.37
-Fixed Eyelashes.
-Oddeye not supported.

Version 1.36
-Fixed modeling of face.

Version 1.35
-Supported odd eyes.
-If you want to make odd eye, please rename to "177xxxEyesLeft(or Right)" the textures name which you want to use.

Version 1.34
-Adjusted mole position.

Version 1.33
-Edited vertex thoroughly(All characters).
-Adjusted the eyes texture(Nora and Sandra).
-Changed Sandra voice.

Version 1.32a(Minor Update)
-Changed the eyes texure(Monica and Mira only).

Version 1.32
-Changed Nora's eyes texture.
-Narrowed Sandra's forehead.
-Replaced Eyeenvironmentmask(All characters).

Version 1.31a (Minor Update)
-Improved eyes textures : Monica.

Version 1.31
-Changed the eyes texture.(Monica and Mira).
-Replaced Eyecubemap(All characters).

Version 1.3
-Replaced Normalmap(All characters).
-Edited vertex around the nose(Serana is excluded).

Version 1.241
-Fixed a break in the neck when you chose Mira weight 100.

Version 1.24
-Fixed the contour of around jaw.

Version 1.23
-Changed each follower perks. If you updating from before v1.22, please make cleansave without F177 Followers.

Version 1.22
-Changed Nora's spell and perks.
-Changed each follower status again. minimum level set to 1.

Version 1.21
-Changed Sandra face.
-Changed Serana face.
-Replaced with one of the "Eyebrow Specularity Fix" the "femalebrow_n.dds" included in each follower. In ENB using, eyebrow never shines anymore.

Version 1.2
-Added new follower : Sandra.

Version 1.15
-Completely reproduced the makeup data of the follower in the own environment.

Version 1.14
-Adjusted the status.

Version 1.13
-Supported installer :Mira and merged version.

Version 1.12
-Adjusted the face data of around nose.

Version 1.11
-Changed makeup.
-Revised face data.

Version 1.1
-Added new follower : Nora.
-Added merged-version.
-Changed file structure.

Version 1.01
-Tuned the face data. (Mira,Monica)
-Deleted the unnecessary file.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
